title.narrative: B2B: DGE and Kemic and Beza-lel and Willstan Company and Mining Limited

description.narrative:
B2B: DGE and Kemic and Beza-lel and Willstan Company and Mining Limited
During the introductory stage of the partnership, focus will be on introducing research-based technological solutions for removing iron, manganese and other contaminants and also establishing a manufacturing plant to produce water treatment plants locally, and develop the market for the products.
After successful introduction of the treatment plants in Ghana, additional services will be introduced, such as ¿ Treatment of groundwater with high levels of dissolve chloride ¿ Treatment of ground water with high level of fluoride. ¿ Hydro geological studies and Drilling of boreholes ¿ Setting up of Modern and well equipped Mobile Laboratory for carrying out water quality analysis.
The objectives of the programme has since been revised to focus on implementing a well functioning demonstrating plants at two site; Agona Nwanta and Begero
